job_tasks.phrase: Develop and maintain Pega applications with a focus on GenAI capabilities.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly mentions developing and maintaining applications, which is a core software development activity, with a specific focus on integrating GenAI.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and implement AI-driven case management solutions to streamline workflows and improve decision-making.
job_tasks.justification: Designing and implementing AI-driven solutions implies the development or application of models to achieve specific outcomes like streamlining workflows and improving decision-making.

job_tasks.phrase: integrating advanced AI capabilities into our Pega platform.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase indicates the integration of AI capabilities into an existing platform, which is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: collaborate with business analysts, data scientists, and other stakeholders to understand requirements and deliver high-quality solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This describes working with stakeholders to understand business needs and translate them into technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: work on GenAI topics related to Case Management.
job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly data engineering, understanding and working with GenAI topics within a specific domain like Case Management often involves data aspects like data preparation and feature engineering, which falls under the broader umbrella of preparing data for models.

soft_skills.phrase: collaborate with business analysts, data scientists, and other stakeholders
Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in Pega and AI technologies and apply them to enhance our systems.
Design and implement AI-driven case management solutions to streamline workflows and improve decision-making.

classification.rationale: This role heavily emphasizes Pega development and integrating GenAI into existing Pega applications rather than core GenAI model development. The primary focus appears to be on the application and integration of GenAI within a specific business process (Case Management) using a particular platform (Pega), rather than deep expertise in building or fine-tuning generative models themselves.
